permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view the details of franchise members.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to add new franchise members.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to modify existing franchise member details.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove franchise members from the system.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view course details.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to create new courses.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to modify existing course details.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove courses from the system.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view details of business verticals.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to create new business verticals.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to modify existing business vertical details.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove business verticals from the system.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view franchise details.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to create new franchises.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to modify existing franchise details.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove franchises from the system.
